attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has now doubled the tax you pay on flights....where is this money going? Apparently, it's just to stop people from flying so much, therefore reducing the amount of flights, to save on the environment. This money is just another way of the government getting more money out of us. Please sign the petition to help us to wipe out this pathetic tax!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
